text: {"answer": "F", "reasoning": "i incorrect (res judicata binds parties, not generally interested persons, Art. 60 ZPO); ii incorrect (7 equal Federal Councillors, rotating presidency, no PM or dissolution powers); iii incorrect (penal order up to 6 months custody, Art. 352 StPO); iv incorrect (autopoietic theory views legal/political systems as autonomous, no direct triggering of democratic impulses)."}
